Immediate Custom Actions

System (SystemTools.dll)
  • Win32_CopyFile, Win32_MoveFile, Win32_DeleteFile, Win32_GetFileSize, Win32_FileExists, Win32_ReadFile, Win32_WriteFile
  • Win32_CreateDirectory, Win32_DeleteDirectory, Win32_GetSpecialFolderPath
  • CompareVersion
  • Service_Control, Service_RenameRegistryEntry, Service_Delete, Service_ChangeBinaryPathName, Service_ChangeDisplayName, Service_ChangeDescription, Service_GetConfig, Service_Exists
  • Registry_CopyBranch, Registry_DeleteBranch, Registry_MoveBranch
  • Registry_CreateKey, Registry_KeyExists, Registry_SetStringValue
  • Win32_IsValidGuid, Win32_GenerateGuidString
Strings (StringTools.dll)
  • String_Replace, String_Trim, String_LTrim, String_RTrim
  • Regex_Match, Regex_Replace
  • String_ToLower, String_ToUpper
Active Directory (ActiveDirectory.dll)
  • DirectoryObjectPicker
  • DirectoryGetDcName
  • ADSI_GetAttributeValue
Data Sources (DataSource.dll)
  • ConfigDataSource, ConfigDataSource_Access, ConfigDataSource_SQLServer
  • SQLDMO_ListAvailableSQLServers
  • ODBC_Connect, ODBC_Execute, ODBC_Execute_Binary, ODBC_GetString, ODBC_GetScalar, ODBC_GetXml
Security & Authentication (UserPrivileges.dll)
  • CheckCredentials
  • CheckPrivilege
  • CheckMembership
  • GetUserInfo, GetUserNameFormatted
Cryptography (Cryptography.dll)
  • CryptProtectDataHex
  • CryptUnprotectDataHex
  • HexEncodeA & HexEncodeW, HexDecodeA & HexDecodeW
  • Base64EncodeA & Base64EncodeW, Base64DecodeA & Base64DecodeW
  • DESEDE3_GenerateKey, DESEDE3_Encrypt & DESEDE3_Decrypt
  • GenerateRandomString
Xml (XmlTools.dll)
  • Xml_SelectNodeXml, Xml_SelectNodeValue & Xml_SelectNodeAttributeValue
  • Xml_DeleteNodes
  • Xml_XslTransform
Msi (MsiTools.dll)
  • BinaryWrite
TcpIp (SystemTools.dll)
  • TcpIp_BindSocket, TcpIp_Connect
